abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column asserts that Boston Celtics president of basketball operations Danny Ainge is premier NBA executive, outperforming even Celtics legend and current Pacers executive Larry Bird; says Ainge has built solid foundation, and now must draft prime-time stars.

headline.print_headline: Celtics Have Solid Base, but Their Architect Works on Bigger Plans
headline.main: Celtics’ Danny Ainge Is Striving to Build Another Winner

snippet: Ainge has developed a roster of solid, young veterans, but his efforts to acquire or draft stars will determine if the Celtics can challenge in the East.
lead_paragraph: Ainge has developed a roster of solid, young veterans, but his efforts to acquire or draft stars will determine if the Celtics can challenge in the East.
